label: ham
subject: Re: [R] installing R on Ubuntu
body: 98 (return) [ Restan, or Arethusa, at the equal distance of sixteen miles between Emesa (_Hems_) and Epiphania, (_Hamath_,) was founded, or at least named, by Seleucus Nicator. Its peculiar ¾ra dates from the year of Rome 685, according to the medals of the city. In the decline of the Seleucides, Emesa and Arethusa were usurped by the Arab Sampsiceramus, whose posterity, the vassals of Rome, were not extinguished in the reign of Vespasian.ÑÑSee DÕAnvilleÕs Maps and Geographie Ancienne, tom. ii. p. 134. Wesseling, Itineraria, p. 188, and Noris. Epoch Syro-Macedon, p. 80, 481, 482.]
